sqlMap.select: SELECT A.YEAR , A.SUBJECT_ID , A.SUBJECT_NM , A.STRAT_SUBJECT_ID , B.STRAT_SUBJECT_NM , A.STRAT_DIRECT_ID , C.STRAT_DIRECT_NM , A.SUBJECT_TARGET , A.CHARGE_USER_ID , D.USER_NM AS CHARGE_USER_NM , A.CHARGE_DEPT_ID , E.DEPT_NM AS CHARGE_DEPT_NM , A.YEAR + 1 AS Y_1 , A.YEAR + 5 AS Y_2 , A.YEAR_ACTUAL_PLAN , A.MULTY_YEAR_ACTUAL_PLAN , A.SORT_ORDER FROM STR_SUBJECT A LEFT OUTER JOIN STR_STRAT_SUBJECT B ON A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.STRAT_SUBJECT_ID = B.STRAT_SUBJECT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN STR_STRAT_DIRECT C ON A.YEAR = C.YEAR AND A.STRAT_DIRECT_ID = C.STRAT_DIRECT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN V_ROLE_USER D ON A.CHARGE_USER_ID = D.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN V_DEPTINFO E ON A.CHARGE_DEPT_ID = E.DEPT_ID WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.SUBJECT_ID = #findSubjectId#

SELECT YEAR , SUBJECT_ID , SEQ , ATTACH_FILE_NM , ATTACH_FILE_FNM , ATTACH_FILE_SUFFIX , F_ENCRYPT(ATTACH_FILE_PATH, #encryptionCode#) ATTACH_FILE_PATH FROM STR_SUBJECT_ATTACH WHERE YEAR = #findYear# AND SUBJECT_ID = #findSubjectId# ORDER BY SEQ
